Support Our Students UMass Lowell (SOS) is a nonprofit organization dedicated to reducing hunger experienced by low-income students pursuing higher education.

With this app you can request to donate a guest meal, see upcoming SOS events, and see the latest facebook posts from SOS.
Please enter your name and UML student e-mail for this app, and select an e-mail account configured on your phone for registration.
Please select an e-mail account on your phone. This e-mail account will be used to send the message.

1.) Results are shown below. Tapping a result will bring you to another page with more information about the event, and you can sign up for the event or add it to your calendar.

2.) You may get a window from Google asking for your permission to manage your calendars and/or manage your mail. Selecting allow will let you be able to sign up for events and add events to your calendar. After selecting allow, please click Sign Up or Add to Calendar again.
